title: Demi Lovato posts another untouched bikini pic: 'No photoshop,' please
text:
Singer and activist Demi Lovato posted another inspiring and untouched bikini pic on Sunday.

"No photoshop pls & thank u," she wrote. "Also big thanks to @izabelag4 & @maremareswimw for my new fav bikini... y’all know my thing for leopard print bikinis and now of course lime green."

The post is nearing 4.4 million likes and has comments from fellow stars like Debra Messing, who wrote, "So gorgeous."

Marlon Wayans added, "Own it. U look great."

The post comes just days after she shared another inspiring pic in the same outfit, writing, "This is my biggest fear. A photo of me in a bikini unedited. And guess what, it’s CELLULIT!!!! I’m just literally sooooo tired of being ashamed of my body."

She added, "I want this new chapter in my life to be about being authentic to who I am rather than trying to meet someone else’s standards. So here’s me, unashamed, unafraid and proud to own a body that has fought through so much and will continue to amaze me when I hopefully give birth one day."

In that post from earlier in the month, a certain "Bachelorette" star Lovato has had eyes on commented.

Mike Johnson wrote on this pic, "Look at me like that again love yaself."

He didn't comment on the latest pic, but fans are still hoping that this possible love connection is real.

The online flirtation began this summer as Johnson was sent home on the love reality show, but Lovato taking to Instagram to let the world know she would "accept your rose."

She posted a couple Instagram stories about the handsome professional from Texas. Fans have been flooding Johnson's social media, telling him that a Grammy nominee is into him.
description: Singer and activist Demi Lovato posted another inspiring and untouched bikini pic on Sunday.
